title: Electrum Drum Machine/Sampler v4.7.7
description:
Programmable drum machine.

- WAV file import - Load YOUR OWN SAMPLES from SDCARD. Long press a sound button to bring up the sample loading dialog.
Use my Sonic Chop app (sold separate) to chop samples from Music on your device and load them right into Electrum!
- Use samples and loops to make beats and songs.
- Load up to 16 samples. Swipe Left/Right to access the next eight sample pads
- 16 Mute groups available
- Load MIDI drum files for quicker programming. Electrum comes with an assortment of pre-made MIDI files.
- Preview (audition) samples LIVE while the machine is playing, they will mix right into the beat.
- Set samples or loops to retrigger on programmed slots or to play completely through before triggering the sample again - useful for using loops!
- Look at the MENU for more options such as ability to save and load your own custom drumkits - once you've loaded the sounds you like unto the pads and adjusted them you can save the settings as a drumkit, separate from the patch itself!
- RECORD samples with the microphone.
- Stretch loops to fit the current project BPM.
- Edit a sample's start and end point, pitch and pan Left/Right.
- Use other time signatures such as 3/4, 6/8, etc.
- Add some swing to your beats with the SHUFFLE setting.

- Add FX to your samples:

- Reverse
- Delay
- Distortion
- Reverb
- Stereo Spread

- Play Electrum with an external USB MIDI controller
USB MIDI Control has been tested on:
Galaxy Nexus phone
Galaxy Tablet 10.1
Motorola XOOM

- Sample accurate playback engine.
- External control of Electrum from other apps using broadcast messages
- WAV/MIDI/Pad Export-load your song into FruityLoops or other DAW!
- Sharing - install the Soundcloud app from the market and you can share beats right to soundcloud (see Electrum's Menu->More->Share)

What's New:

4.7.7 - Added small button to main screen and to mixer screen, click it to swap the pads/faders to next set of 8. Should be easier than swiping (swiping left/right still works too)

More info:
